<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">
[Befitting Attire](/Spells.aspx?ID=867)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=163" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 90 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deity**
[The Resplendent Court](/Deities.aspx?ID=272)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 5 willing creatures
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 hour
</row>

</column>

---

You cloak the targets in an illusion, shaping their clothing and worn items into ones suitable for a particular occasion. You visualize the occasion, and the spell creates illusory attire customized to each target. For instance, if you visualized a noble ball, armor would appear to be fine clothing. This doesn't change identifying details of the targets' appearances other than their clothes.

 Any creature that touches the attire, uses the [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) action to examine it, or otherwise interacts with it can attempt to [disbelieve](/Rules.aspx?ID=267) your illusion.

---
**Heightened (4th)** You can target up to 20 creatures.

**Heightened (5th)** You can target up to 100 creatures.
name: Befitting Attire
